item.title: 3 mitmproxy Tips You Might Not Know About
item.description: Photo by Ashley Batz mitmproxy is a powerful proxy tool for debugging network requests and responses. It’s my favorite proxy tool and becoming one of my daily essential tools for working. I would like to share with you 3 mitmproxy tips you might not know about. First things first, a small checklist: Do you know how mitmproxy works? Do you know how to install mitmproxy?

item.title: Bad Use of A Good Tool
item.description: Photo by Jim If all you have is a hammer, everything looks like a nail. Every sprint, we have a team testing session with one hour fixed time slot. It’s a team-fun-thing for all team members to try out new features. I take the honor to organize this testing party. But unfortunately, the last sprint I failed to prepare test devices in time, which causes that the team testing didn’t end very well.
